name: Rhythm Mortis
description:
• Arrow keys to move, Z or X on your keyboard to shoot.
  • Every time you kill a zombie on the grid you're adding a note to your composition.
  • Walk over notes to erase them
  • Try not to get eaten by a zombie.  Please.

For reasons I don't understand yet, it runs slow in anything except desktop Chrome... Easy solution though, use Chrome.

PRO-TIP: If you hold down the shoot button while moving, you'll keep shooting in the same direction.
